snippet.title: Bound By Blades - Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Bound By Blades is an Action RPG inspired by the Monster Hunter series with a unique Four Corner combat system.

Kickstarter is over, but the game is continuing development!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/973070/Bound_By_Blades/

Check out more on the site https://boundbyblades.com/

Join Discord: https://discord.gg/bbb

Follow Twitter: https://twitter.com/BoundByBlades
